review_blob: dont look at the label it will just thrw you off.  A+ for the marketing a D for the brewmaster.  Dont bet the farm on it.

was pumped up for greatness but was let down at the first swallow.  the octoberfect is great but this year round falls short of something spectacular.  A beer to sip on an not take to quickly.  Great tast but leave a resin on the palate.

great winter brew.  usually dont care for sam adams brews, besides the octoberfest but this one hits the spot great taste and great finish.  Not a bad alc. % and clean aftertast.  Not as filling as most other winter brews and not too thick.
